item.title: Conference List (Compilers and Programming Languages)
item.description: Sl.No. Conference Submission Core Rank (2020) Scope of the Conference 1. POPL July A* Programming languages and systems. (both theoretical and experimental papers) 2. OOPSLA October and April A* All practical and theoretical investigations of programming languages, systems and environments. 3. ECOOP December and March A* 4. PLDI November A* 5. SAS May A 6. CGO May and September A 7. CC November A 8. ICFP March A* 9. PACT March A 10.
